instructor.name: Naimath B
instructor.about: I am an experienced software and game developer with a five-year track record of teaching various technologies. My expertise lies in Python and C++, and I've successfully delivered numerous projects with thousands of users on my published apps. Additionally, my involvement in the graphics design industry has equipped me to share my knowledge in that domain as well.

instructor.name: Praveen A
instructor.about: I've served as a UX/UI Tutor for two years while concurrently working as a Freelance UX/UI Designer. I'm passionate about imparting design knowledge to creative individuals.

popupData.shortDesc: Creating handcrafted paper blooms provides an excellent alternative to maintaining the fresh flower aesthetic, offering a timeless and maintenance-free solution.

instructor.name: Naresh M
instructor.about: As a crafting instructor, I inspire creativity through hands-on learning. With expertise in diverse techniques and materials, my classes offer a supportive environment for mastering intricate details and exploring artistic expression. Join me in unlocking your crafting potential, where each session is a journey of skill-building and creative fulfillment. Let's craft together!

popupData.shortDesc: Capturing the essence of fresh blooms in your drawings is effortlessly achieved through the artful creation of handcrafted paper flowers, providing a perennially vibrant and maintenance-free alternative.

instructor.name: Praveen S
instructor.about: As a drawing instructor, I guide aspiring artists on a journey of self-expression. Through techniques, strokes, and the interplay of light and shadow, I empower students to bring their imagination to life on the canvas. Join me in exploring the captivating world of drawing, where creativity knows no bounds.

popupData.shortDesc: In the realm of painting, masterfully crafting paper blooms offers a splendid avenue to replicate the beauty of fresh flowers without the constraints of upkeep, allowing your artwork to bloom eternally with vibrant, maintenance-free allure.

instructor.name: Praveen S
instructor.about: As a painting instructor, I lead students through the vibrant realm of artistic expression. Guiding brushstrokes and color palettes, I empower individuals to transform canvases into visual narratives. Join me in the world of painting, where creativity blossoms, and every stroke is a brush with self-discovery and boundless imagination.

popupData.shortDesc: Infuse your sketches with perpetual floral elegance through the artful depiction of handcrafted paper blooms, eliminating the need for upkeep.

instructor.name: Naresh M
instructor.about: In my role as a sketching instructor, I facilitate a journey into the world of lines and forms. Guiding aspiring sketch artists, I encourage the exploration of diverse techniques to capture scenes, emotions, and ideas. Join me in honing the skill of sketching, where each stroke unveils the beauty of spontaneous creativity on paper.
